citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 13:00-13:30
on 29-Jun-17.
Arrived at facility to find no one present. Knocked on door to residence and honked horn. No answer on provided
phone number.
